title: （英國JJ注意）取消埋支持修例官員議員的已有英國護照同埋重新申請BC的權利

replies.msg:
繼取消支持修例官員議員美國護照外，其實英國政府都有一個petition 網：

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/check

只要有10,000個人既簽名，國會就會回應；而如果超過100,000個簽名，呢個請願的議題將會係國會上辯論。

但問題係一定要British Citizen 或 UK Resident 先可以投。

有無UK連仔可以幫手起左個petition先？

根據取消外國護照樓主的UK公開信，佢用既ground 係話支持修例的議員同官員違犯左
Home Office document 入面 Guide RS1 Application for registration as a British citizen by a person who has made a declaration of renunciation的其一個條件：

“To be of good character you should have shown respect for the rights and freedoms of the UK, observe its laws and fulfilled your duties and obligations as a resident of the UK.”

簡單姐係唔尊重UK的法治自由（修例將嚴重違反中英聯合聲明入面賦予香港的權利及自由）

其他法律JJ可以幫手睇下UK law 仲有咩compelling ground 可以用；本人只搵到：

British Nationality Act 1981 (“BNA81”) Section 40(2) and (4)

(2): The Secretary of State may by order deprive a person of a citizenship status if the Secretary of State is satisfied that deprivation is conducive to the public good.

(4): The Secretary of State may not make an order under subsection (2) if he is satisfied that the order would make a person stateless.

唔sure threshold 係點，但2017年UK有104個人係被呢個ground stripped of British Citizenship (Source: https://www.economist.com/the-economist-explains/2019/03/08/when-can-governments-revoke-citizenship)

—-

Rationale 參考 - 全文見：https://drive.google.com/open?id=1uFBT789ZE3Q5YxA038SFVou7lhx3koid

Format參考： https://petitions.whitehouse.gov/petition/revoke-us-citizenship-and-visas-hong-kong-and-china-officials-who-are-support-extradition-bill

replies.msg:
有少少意見，我唔知你有冇提及，只係我覺得個理據有少少唔夠力。可以由宣誓入籍方向去搞？指明佢地係宣誓就職之時表明效忠中國。

以下係轉載至852郵報

入籍英國人士需要宣讀以下誓詞：「I, [name], swear by Almighty God that, on becoming a British citizen, I will be faithful and bear true allegiance to Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth the Second, Her Heirs and Successors according to law. I will give my loyalty to the United Kingdom and respect its rights and freedoms. I will uphold its democratic values. I will observe its laws faithfully and fulfil my duties and obligations as a British citizen. 」

誓詞中明確提及要效忠英女王，以及遵守英國法律，履行英國公民應盡的職責及義務。

除了英國，集中了大部分香港移民的國家如美國、加拿大、澳洲、紐西蘭等，入籍時，都需宣讀相關誓詞，效忠其國家。屬於英聯邦國家的加拿大及紐西蘭，入籍誓詞中同樣要求國民效忠英女王，以及遵守當地法律。

而在美國，入籍人士宣誓時除了被要求放棄對任何外籍君王、主權的效忠外（I hereby declare, on oath, that I absolutely and entirely renounce and abjure all allegiance and fidelity to any foreign prince, potentate, state, or sovereignty, of whom or which I have heretofore been a subject or citizen…），還要宣誓願意支持美利堅合眾國憲法，並以此對抗國內國外敵人，同時在法律的要求下，願意為國家提供非戰鬥式的軍事服務等（…that I will support and defend the Constitution and laws of the United States of America against all enemies, foreign and domestic; … that I will perform noncombatant service in the Armed Forces of the United States when required by the law…）

而在美國，入籍人士宣誓時除了被要求放棄對任何外籍君王、主權的效忠外（I hereby declare, on oath, that I absolutely and entirely renounce and abjure all allegiance and fidelity to any foreign prince, potentate, state, or sovereignty, of whom or which I have heretofore been a subject or citizen…），還要宣誓願意支持美利堅合眾國憲法，並以此對抗國內國外敵人，同時在法律的要求下，願意為國家提供非戰鬥式的軍事服務等（…that I will support and defend the Constitution and laws of the United States of America against all enemies, foreign and domestic; … that I will perform noncombatant service in the Armed Forces of the United States when required by the law…）

quote.msg:
繼取消支持修例官員議員美國護照外，其實英國政府都有一個petition 網：

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/check

只要有10,000個人既簽名，國會就會回應；而如果超過100,000個簽名，呢個請願的議題將會係國會上辯論。

但問題係一定要British Citizen 或 UK Resident 先可以投。

有無UK連仔可以幫手起左個petition先？

根據取消外國護照樓主的UK公開信，佢用既ground 係話支持修例的議員同官員違犯左
Home Office document 入面 Guide RS1 Application for registration as a British citizen by a person who has made a declaration of renunciation的其一個條件：

“To be of good character you should have shown respect for the rights and freedoms of the UK, observe its laws and fulfilled your duties and obligations as a resident of the UK.”

簡單姐係唔尊重UK的法治自由（修例將嚴重違反中英聯合聲明入面賦予香港的權利及自由）

其他法律JJ可以幫手睇下UK law 仲有咩compelling ground 可以用；本人只搵到：

British Nationality Act 1981 (“BNA81”) Section 40(2) and (4)

(2): The Secretary of State may by order deprive a person of a citizenship status if the Secretary of State is satisfied that deprivation is conducive to the public good.

(4): The Secretary of State may not make an order under subsection (2) if he is satisfied that the order would make a person stateless.

唔sure threshold 係點，但2017年UK有104個人係被呢個ground stripped of British Citizenship (Source: https://www.economist.com/the-economist-explains/2019/03/08/when-can-governments-revoke-citizenship)
